title: Things the guys who stole my phone have texted me to try...
content:
Things the guys who stole my phone have texted me to try to get me to unlock it. ‚ÄúAs the texts escalated in complexity and rage, I sympathized with their plight. I mean, not enough to unlock my phone.‚Äù
